titles.title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions classified to chapters 44, 45, 46, and 47 of title 50, United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/18/2015--Introduced. This bill makes technical amendments to specified Public Laws and USCA chapters, including the Homeland Security Act of 2002, the Immigration and Nationality Act, the Classified Information Procedures Act, the Internal Revenue Code, the National Security Act of 1947, and the Central Intelligence Act of 1949.
